report_title: Distribution and Logistics Consulting Services in the US
executive_summary: The Distribution and Logistics Consulting Services industry provides expert analysis and consultation in supply chain management and distribution optimization. In the consulting industry, demand is primarily influenced by health in the broader economy and its effect on business investment. In the current period, distribution and logistics consultants have benefited from positive economic growth, corporate profit levels, industrial production and aggregate private investment.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Low Barriers to Entry Allow Easy Industry Access
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: The Distribution and Logistics Consulting Services industry represents businesses primarily engaged in third-party consultation for storage optimization, supply chain management and distribution control. While these services are also provided by the Management Consulting industry, logistics specializations have become increasingly important in recent decades as many customers and businesses expect physical products quickly.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Secondary focuses of waste reduction, packing efficiency and detailed tracking
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Secondary focuses of waste reduction, packing efficiency and detailed tracking have also been proven to provide value to the logistics chain.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Fundamental disparities exist between the largest and smallest competitors
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: For instance, McKinsey & Company, one of the largest industry consultants, is a multinational consulting company with operations worldwide.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Healthy Macroeconomic Conditions Will Fuel Revenue Growth
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Following complications that plagued the previous period, revenue growth for the Distribution and Logistics Consulting Services industry will continue to be consistent.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Supply Chain Resiliency Will Be a Primary Focus Moving Forward
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: The historical aim of supply chain management has been to reduce per-unit costs.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: E-commerce Will Remain a Primary Growth Market
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: While the next five years will be primarily characterized by continued economic improvement, e-commerce's effect on retail still represents the major underlying theme for supply chain management.
As the broader industry continues to strengthen over the next five years, industry participation in terms of both new entrants and employment will increase.

industry_definition: This industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in providing operating advice and assistance to businesses and other organizations in multiple areas.

negative_impact_factors: Low - Steady Barriers To Entry Level

key_trends: Competition has recently increased from companies in other industries.
Consulting companies center around their employees.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Shipping and distribution are essential to the success and profitability of retailers and consumer product companies.
The healthcare sector includes hospital management, pharmaceutical companies and life science companies.
Manufacturers often rely on inputs from different locations to complete their products and transport them to end users or retailers.
This market primarily uses consulting services to improve efficiency and reduce costs associated with the transportation of goods.

products_and_services.product_description: Transportation Consulting Services are the largest product offering.
Inventory carrying cost is the total of all expenses related to storing unsold goods.
Logistics and distribution consultants often help companies implement warehouse management systems.
Other services include logistics administration consulting and forwarding consulting services.

tier_1_suppliers: Office Supply Stores in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Computer Peripheral Manufacturing in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_description: The freight transportation services index is a key indicator used to measure the annual output of the US transportation sector.

business_locations.location_description: The Southeast region accounts for more than a quarter of industry establishments.
California represents a large portion of establishments because of the area's large population.
The region includes densely populated cities in New York and New Jersey.

regulations_points.regulation_description: In response to the Enron crisis and the dissolution of Arthur Andersen.

barriers_points.barrier_description: They can include compliance with regulations such as data privacy laws.

basis_points.basis_title: Competition has recently increased from companies in other industries
basis_points.basis_description: For example, the services provided by the IT Consulting industry have increasingly overlapped with this industry.

concentration_points.concentration_title: LOW BARRIERS TO ENTRY LIMITS CONCENTRATION
concentration_points.concentration_description: Similar to other consulting-based industries, this industry is highly fragmented.

cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Wages as a share of revenue have increased over the past five years.

capital_intensity_points.capital_intensity_description: This industry has a low capital intensity.

volatility_points.volatility_title: Demand is influenced by the broader economic climate
volatility_points.volatility_description: Economic indicators such as corporate profit levels affect demand.

technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Advisors are integrating AI and ML into their processes.

FAQs.question: Does your company specialize in a particular market?
FAQs.answer: Logistics consultants vary in addressable customer groups and services.
